body.name: SENSARTE Nonstick Deep Frying Pan Skillet, 10/11/12-inch Saute Pan with Lid, Stay-cool Handle, Chef Pan Healthy Stone Cookware Cooking Pan, Induction Compatible, PFOA Free (10-Inch)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 32 mins
features: Swiss Non-Stick Coating - Switzerland ILAG nonstick granite coating, SGS approved. PFOA free, smokeless, safe & healthy. Cooking with little oil for healthy diet.

Suitable For All Stoves - High magnetic conductive stainless steel base allows the deep frying pan to work on all cooktops, including induction. The core of the frying pan is made of die cast aluminum, which is durable and heats up quickly and evenly.

Versatile Saute Pan with Pour Spout- Size: 10" diameter, 2.7" tall, 3.5 Quart. Deep and large enough for saute, stirfry, boil, shallow fry & deep fry. The pour spout is super handy for soups and oils.

Glass Lid & Stay-cool Handle - Durable tempered glass lid makes it convenient to see the cooking status and limits splashes on your stove. Woodgrain bakelite handle is comfortable to grip and stays cool while cooking. Oven safe to 302°F.
Easy To Clean - Nonstick and no rivets, this chef pan is super easy to clean. Simply wipe it over with a sponge and warm soapy water. Make your daily food intake easier to make.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose SENSARTE Nonstick Saute Pans？ Versatile Cookware - Everything from saute, steam, boil, shallow fry & deep fry. This large 3.5/4.3/5QT Saute Pan is big enough to hold a family meal;This deep skillet interior & exterior is coated by high performance Swiss non-stick granite coating, which makes the saute pan easy to cook and clean;Cast aluminum core assures fast and even heating which can speed up cooking time;Deep cooking surface makes it very versatile and help to keep a lot in the pan. Can be used for saute, steam, boil, shallow fry & deep fry, and minimize spills and splatters;Convenient spout helps pour sauces and other liquids easily;All-in-one design, no rivets, avoids rust and easy to clean. Just wipe it with a paper towel or rinse it with water, which make cooking not only easier but also more enjoyable.No need to season the pot before or after using.

Magnetic Conductive Bottom Flat and thick bottom (5mm)Stainless steel induction baseFast cooking and heat evenlySuitable for all stove Ergonomic Bakelite Handle The handle is made of bakelite, so it's comfortable to hold and stays cooling while cooking, reduces heat burn opportunities. Max. temp is 302℉. Vented Tempered Glass Lid Tempered glass lid is durable and has a high transparency, which makes it easy to see what you are doing, and limits splashes on your stove. The rim of lid that would seal in the steam and flavor, bring you a tasty meal.

USE & CARE Stay away from metal utensil in cooking as well as steel wools in cleaning.After cooking on it, leave it on the stove to cool down on it's own.Use High Heat Plastic or Wood utensils. Clean with soap, water, soft sponge and wipe with thin film of Oil.Designed for all stovetops, including induction stovetop. Low to medium heat is recommended. Oven safe to 400℉ ( without handles ).Recommend hand washing for longer term use. Suitable for dishwasher at low temperature.The Instruction is on the back of the card.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Solid Culinary Companion
reviews.reviewText: This skillet has proven itself to be a reliable and efficient addition to my kitchen, offering a combination of thoughtful design and commendable performance.The nonstick feature of this pan deserves applause. It has transformed my cooking experience, allowing for easy food release without the need for excessive oils. This not only contributes to healthier cooking but also simplifies the cleaning process.The addition of a well-fitted lid is a thoughtful touch that speaks volumes about the pan's attention to detail. It locks in flavors and moisture, creating a culinary symphony with every dish. The transparent lid allows me to keep a watchful eye on the cooking process, adding precision to my culinary endeavors. If you're in search of a well-rounded frying pan with a thoughtful design, the SENSARTE skillet is a commendable option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this. I'm so tired of these "non-stick" pans that start to bubble or peel after you use them for a bit. I was also looking for a bigger, deeper frying pan. This fits the bill.The pan is really sturdy. It's attractive and a change from all those black non-stick pans. The lids and handles have to be put together but they send a screwdriver to do the assembly (really easy).It's a bit on the heavy side, but I think that it will hold up longer because of that. They advise hand washing, which is fine if it's going to last longer that way.Fried up some ground beef it in for chili, and it heated very evenly, no sticking.I liked it so much I bought a set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far we really like this pan.It has some weight to it, not flimsy like a lot of other pans.The finish is really nice, nothing sticks to it and very easy to clean up.It sits perfectly level on stove, unlike other pans that have a domed bottom.Comes with a nice lid.Definitely would recommend this pan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Cookware, Reasonable Prices
reviews.reviewText: This is a sturdy, well made, perfect capacity frying pan. Back in July, I was looking for an 11" fry pan with a lid that has straight sides that could be used on a glass top electric stove. The 11" skillet met all of the criteria and as a bonus the 4 qt capacity is perfect. I purchased the 11" skillet from Walmart at twice the price that it is sold for on Amazon.After several months of using the 11" skillet, I learned that the Sensarte fry pan met & exceeded all of my cooking needs so I decided to look on Amazon to see if other Sensarte cookware was available. I was pleasantly pleased to find that there are many Sensarte cookware items available on Amazon at extremely reasonable prices.I purchased a 8" & 9.5 egg/omelette skillet, 10" 3.5 qt skillet, 12" 5qt skillet, and 1.5 qt, 2 qt & 2.5 qt sauce pans.This cookware is non-stick, cooks evenly, is sturdy and cleans easily. Additionally every single skillet & sauce pan came with a lid, another huge bonus.I have several very expensive pans with the handles attached to the pan itself with rivets, when the rivets come loose, the pans become unusable garbage because the rivets cannot be tightened. The glass lids are a plus and the larger skillets (9.5", 10", 11" & 12") each come came with a really nice screwdriver to attach the handles. I love it!!! a pan with the ability to tighten the handles with a screw driver is a huge bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Deep Frying Skillet That Handles Well
reviews.reviewText: The pan is distinct looking, more so than the other standard dark brown-gray non-stick pan color. It is speckled and unique-looking. The faux wood handle is cool though evidently fake. I like that there are very few seams and nook/crannies that collect food debris, burnt stuff that makes it hard to clean. As noted in the description, the pan walls do not have rivets for the handle which makes cleaning this pan much more enjoyable. No more burnt schmutz around the rivet getting brown and nasty. The non-stick works well, I cannot complain about it. I like to turn my flame up to medium -high to almost high and it has held up without turning color on the cooking surface. It also has not gotten tacky/sticky from high heat use so far. Only time will tell. I will report back if it gets bad.We use the pan for stir-frying, making bacon, warming tortillas, pretty much everything. Nothing has stuck and it hasn't turned color. After much cooking in it, I will occasionally fry an egg without oil and it still comes out without sticking, though nothing makes things crisp up like a little oil in the pan. It seems to handle everything like a champ. It can go into the oven with moderate temps in the 300Fs. I haven't tried that yet, however. The lid fits well and works nicely. It has a round knob that screws into the lid so you do have to contend with the occasional loosening screw. I do prefer the metal U-shaped handles because of that. The drawback of the u-shaped handle is that you cannot lay the lid flat on its back like you can with the flat top round handle that comes with this one. It's personal preference.The pan is also lighter than my cast iron (as most pans will be) and we tend to use this more for everyday cooking though for searing meats and hamburgers, nothing beats the infernal heat you can inflict upon a cast iron pan.Overall, the pan seems much more high quality and unique than some of the common non-sticks out there. We are pretty rough with our cookware since they are used a great deal, so I will report back in a little while. It's a nice versatile pan for almost all of your cooking. I would get two for multiple uses at the same time, if it were not for my cast iron skillet.

I love this pan! I use it for everything. It heats up quickly, and nothing sticks. Having a lid come with it is so handy. The size of the pan is perfect: big, but not too big. What's amazing is that it comes with a screwdriver to tighten the handle, if and when the handle comes loose like all pan handles do. That, and the wooden handle are very thoughtful. Very nice touch by the company.

reviews.reviewText: creo que debí escoger uno con menor profundidad, se me complica mucho voltear algunos alimentos. Sólo cocino para mi

I love this pan. It’s got to be my favourite pan purchase of all time.The non-stick coating is super top-notch quality and cooking residue just wipes straight off once I’ve let it cool down a bit.Easy clean, heats evenly, sturdy quality. And even came with its own good quality screwdriver for handle removal!
